title: Ticket #5901: condor_transform_ads -json and -xml bug
description:
The command 
condor_transform_ads -rules <rules_file> -xml -out <out_file> <in_file>
does not work correctly. When <in_file> is in xml format, the output <out_file> is transformed to long format.

However, the command 

condor_transform_ads -rules <rules_file> -out:xml <out_file> <in_file>
works correctly.

Same situation if changing xml to json.
creator: shuyang
